name: Sala - Keizou
text:
2 Level 6 or Lower Monsters
When this card is Link Summoned using a "Sala -" Monster: You can Special Summon a "Sala -" Monster from your Deck to a Zone this card points to. You can discard one card and target one "Sala -" Monster you control with a Level or Rank; It becomes a Tuner, and if it has a rank, its rank is treated as a level until the End Phase. You can only use each effect of "Sala - Keizou" once per turn.
